effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a flurry of 7 Demonfire bolts at 100% effectiveness. Casting Summon Infernal always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! increases your Mastery by 2.0% and your spells gain maximum benefit from Mastery: Chaotic Energies for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,927 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3 million Fire damage to your primary target and 244,454 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 1 million Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Mantle of Blazing Sacrifice

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
